artist: After Isaak Janz van Ostade; Cornelis Apostool
description: winter landscape; man and boy crossing bridge over frozen river; man on skates pushing sleigh with barrel on it; woman outside cabin at right; skaters in distance; from Apostool's book  "The Beauties of the Dutch School"
